thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com
thread.title: Miranda

author: Miranda
title: Miranda
text:
I don't like to cook, I don't like to grocery shop....hello fresh has made cooking a fun delicious activity now.
Although one meal was a no go, the other 11 were fantastic. I think that's pretty good stats...plus hello fresh gave me a credit for the meal that didn't please. I appreciated that!
Scheduling and talking on the phone has been a tad problematic...the folks are nice but they don't always get the order right...but they are trying! I really like hello fresh and I am staying with them.
